title: How to stop musical hallucinations - Quora

response.answer_text: Auditory hallucinations as in you hear music that actually isn't there, or musical hallucinations meaning an ear worm, like, a song is stuck in your head? True auditory hallucinations mean you need to see a physician because there are medications to help stop them. If its simply songs being stuck in your head….I need answers to that one too. Tik tok songs my kids listen to are constantly bouncing around in my head.
